sub_title: Career Coach at ISCA | FluentAcrossCultures.nl | Team Facilitator
summary:
Diederika Hoddenbagh's passion is to help people find work that suits them.  Work that gives joy and satisfaction. Motivated people who use their strengths and talents are more productive, more creative and find joy in what they do.  Diederika works with individuals or with teams. She has developed different modules for individual coaching and she also offers different kinds of workshops and Team Facilitation sessions for groups of people working together. Teams can learn to improve their communication, learn to understand each other in spite of different cultural or personal backgrounds and become efficient, performing teams.

Diederika has more than 30 years of work experience with Wycliffe and SIL International, both at home and abroad. She works in the Netherlands and in West-Africa as Career Coach, Team Facilitator and leadership coach. She is fluent in Dutch, English and French.
She has B-level accreditation for the Psychometrical instruments she uses (MBTI, Strong, Belbin, Firo-B).
She is also officially certified and licensed to use The SIMA速 : System for Identifying Motivated Abilities速   (www.emergo.com, www.simainternational.com)
She received her license for official coaching practice at Full Circle Development in the UK.

Besides her work for Wycliffe and SIL she also has her own Career Guidance business: 
ISCA: International Study and Career Advise
www.volgendestap.org. Click on flags to find the language of your choice (Dutch, English or French).

Diederika is Dutch. She was born in South Africa, she grew up in the United States, studied in the Netherlands and lived and worked in various European and West African countries. She is married with Hans and they have two grown-up daughters. She now divides her time between working in the Netherlands and traveling to French speaking West Africa doing coaching, Career Guidance or Team Facilitation wherever she goes.
